page.title: 10A day with the Taylor family
page.content: George Taylor is a member of a self- build group. Lynne Taylor is a school cleaner. Joanne (8) and Amy (5) attend Shortbrook First School. G. gets up at 06.15 and makes breakfasts (muesli for adults, Rice Crispies and Weetabix for girls) before going to work at 08.50. L. has breakfast in bed before going to work at 06.45, returning at 08.30 to take J. and A. to school at 08.45. G. spent the morning glazing the roof of a conservatory, working until 12.15 with a 15min. break for tea at 11.00. L. spent the morning on housework (making beds, tidying bedrooms, lounge and bathroom, washing up pots and washing clothes) and shopping for Grandma at the supermarket, newsagents and chemists. At school, J. watched a filmstrip about Victorian life, sang (cont)
